1: Celebrate the sacred widely; its greatness inspires every community.
2: Divine presence dwells in communities of peace and unity.
3: Peace disarms conflict and establishes lasting calm.
4: Honor supreme excellence above all worldly power.
5: Peace prevails, and the mighty experience deep restorative rest.
6: Righteous authority stills weapons, securing peace.
7: Reverent awe aligns life with good.
8: Justice from above brings peaceful stillness to the earth
9: Justice protects all the humble on earth.
10: Human anger serves good; the rest stays under control.
11: Communities fulfill promises and offer gifts with heartfelt gratitude.
12: Justice humbles proud rulers and ensures accountable leadership on earth.
